data.use_zabbix_api:
Use Zabbix API for receiving zabbix data as sensor info? 
Otherwise only entities state changes will be sent to HOST:PORT part from provided URL.
data.use_zabbix_sender:
Use Zabbix sender interface to send Home Assistant entities state changes? 
Otherwise only Zabbix activer triggers count will be pulled in HA as sensors.
